title: Portuguese Protein Egg Bites with Broccoli with Eggs & Quinoa
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Heat rapeseed oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook eggs 6–8 min until done; remove.
Stir-fry broccoli and aubergine with garam masala 26 min; season.
Return protein to warm through 1–2 min.
Cook the quinoa according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Quinoa or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

Use Spaghetti or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Tempeh and Kale Airfry with Tempeh & Quinoa
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat the air fryer to 190°C.
Toss kale and spinach with half the tahini, salt, pepper and italian herbs; spread on a tray.
Season tempeh and place on the tray. Air-fry for 45 min, turning once.
Cook the quinoa according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Quinoa or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.

title: Peppers & Mushrooms Brown rice with Tempeh with Tempeh & Rice
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal; spicy meals may need a little extra.
method: Preheat grill to high.
Heat peanut butter in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Cook tempeh 6–8 min until done; remove.
Stir-fry peppers and mushrooms with harissa 9 min; season.
Return protein to warm through 1–2 min.
Cook the brown rice according to pack; drain well.
Plate the carb base, add vegetables, top with protein; drizzle remaining pan juices.
swaps: Use chicken breast instead of plant protein for an omnivore option.
Use Brown rice or switch to cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Spice tweak: add fresh chilli for more heat or reduce spice blend for mild.
